name: TelegramGroupVerification
description: Verifies if user is in a Telegram group

parameters.name: botToken
parameters.description: The Telegram bot token used for authenticating requests with the Telegram API.

parameters.name: chatId
parameters.description: The identifier for the Telegram chat or group where membership is being verified.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The Telegram user ID to check for membership within the specified chat.
